name: Pigeon (flyingmantisgames)
description:
I wanted to have some fun between 2 projects. I started the next project so I don't have much time for this anymore, it's not finished but I hope some people will enjoy it. I might work on it again in the future.

If you consider giving some money, it will help me with biggest projects so thanks if you do !

Since I did not take the time to add a tutorial, for you to know :
left and right arrow to move
Up arrow to fly
controls on the ground :
left control to scream
left shift to eat
E to hypnotise

Controls in the air :
Down arrow to charge poop

Shit Cheat codes
F1 for full screen
F2 to restart the game
F4 to fast leave the game
F5 to get diarrhea
F6 to get the poop charge to the max
F7 / F8 to spawn more characters
F9 to add a gun trying to shoot you

I wish you to have fun.
